text: Ricardo González Gutiérrez known as Cepillín () (February 7, 1946 – March 8, 2021) was a Mexican clown, singer, television personality and actor. He was born in Monterrey, Mexico. His career lasted from 1977 until his death. He starred in the Televisa program El Show de Cepillín. Cepillín had another show in 1987 called Una sonrisa con Cepillín on Channel 5 of Televisa. In April 2018, Cepillín endorsed Andrés Manuel López Obrador for president in the 2018 election."México ya necesita un cambio" dice Cepillín y llama a votar por AMLO . El Universal (Mexico City). Retrieved September 20, 2018.
